review: Amazing, very good, now i can view special movies, play nice games, show my screen movil in my 47" tv, read book in the tv and more. I really recomend this device. I apologice for my English, but I am from Venezuela and my English is not good. Thanks
author: Argenis Ramon Macea Garban

review: This product was delivered as promised on time. However, I am unable to make the proper connections to get it to work. I am able to get a picture from the computer to display on the TV screen but cannot solve the issue of getting the sound to play.
author: R. Larkin

review: man. this thing is great. except I can't watch my Amazon video on it. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone with an Amazon prime account.
author: cozza

review: This unit allows me to stream movies and documentaries.  Easy set up and use.  I love it.
author: doug931

review: I had a lot of connectivity issues and the media player when compared to roku- I would rather use Roku than have to take up memory on my cell phone to use the control
author: A Gutierrez Martinez
